Returns a shiny.tag object with the UI for a filter_spec object

data_extract_filter_ui.Rd

Returns a shiny.tag object with the UI for a filter_spec object

data_extract_filter_ui(filter, id = "filter")

Arguments

filter

(filter_spec) the object generated with filter_spec()

id

(character(1)) the shiny inputId for the generated shiny.tag

Value

shiny.tag defining the filter_spec's UI element

Details

Creates two optionSelectInput elements (one for column and one for values) based on a definition of a filter_spec() object.

Examples

teal.transform:::data_extract_filter_ui(filter = filter_spec(vars = "test_var"), id = "test_id")
#> <div class="filter_spec">
#>   <div class="shinyjs-hide">
#>     <div class="form-group shiny-input-container shinyjs-hide">
#>       <label class="control-label shiny-label-null" for="test_id-col"></label>
#>       <select data-actions-box="true" data-none-selected-text="- Nothing selected -" data-max-options="Inf" data-show-subtext="true" data-live-search="false" id="test_id-col" class="selectpicker form-control" multiple="multiple"><option value="test_var" selected>test_var</option></select>
#>     </div>
#>     <label id="test_id-col_textonly" class="control-label"></label>
#>     <code id="test_id-col_valueonly">test_var</code>
#>   </div>
#>   <div class="form-group shiny-input-container">
#>     <label class="control-label" for="test_id-vals">Filter by</label>
#>     <select data-actions-box="false" data-none-selected-text="- Nothing selected -" data-max-options="1" data-show-subtext="true" data-live-search="false" id="test_id-vals" class="selectpicker form-control" multiple="multiple"><option value=""></option></select>
#>   </div>
#> </div>
